name: Gift of the Forest
details:
Gift of the Forest improves Melee Power Damage Bonus| Ranged Power Damage Bonus| and Physical Armor Bonus by 2% per point spent.
The first point in this talent grants a permanent Energy Regeneration Rate of 2(s) in all Power Trays.
WARNING: Purchasing this talent commits you to the Warden promotion path and prevents access to the Archer and Brigand promotion paths.
